short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto save Make (formerly integromat) scenarios and download logs, developed by MSquare Automation Solutions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Scenario Helper" simplifies the process of saving scenarios and downloading operation logs, putting the control back in your hands.

Key Features:

1. Automated scenario saving at your preferred intervals
2. Hassle-free downloading of operation consumption data for scenario workflows
3. Effortlessly manage your Make automation projects

Enhance your automation journey today with "Scenario Helper" and discover a new level of efficiency and control. Elevate your Make experience and empower your automation efforts. Get started now!
